rooms.description: A welcoming space with open layout integrating Vastu guidelines for positive energy flow.
Lounge area adjacent to the kitchen and dining area. Features natural light from West-facing windows in accordance with Vastu principles.
Modern kitchen design integrated within the open concept living space, ensuring efficient workflow and ventilation.
A spacious master bedroom with a balcony for relaxation, positioned to receive optimal lighting and air circulation from the west side of the plot.
Cozy secondary bedroom featuring a private balcony that respects privacy and adheres to Vastu guidelines for family harmony.
Compact bedroom with a balcony design ensuring a peaceful retreat in line with local design norms.
Additional bedroom space, each designed with balconies for natural light and ventilation as per Indian residential standards.
A dedicated home theater room with acoustics and lighting optimized to enhance entertainment experiences. Located on the ground floor in a sound-insulated area.

openings.description: Access to the balcony with natural ventilation and aesthetic appeal.

notes: The design incorporates a split-level layout on multiple floors. Additional levels may include upper levels for additional amenities or private spaces, ensuring that each bedroom has its dedicated balcony and the home theater is sound-proofed appropriately. The overall design follows Bohemian aesthetics with an emphasis on natural materials, vibrant colors, and artistic decor.
